attributes.action: Scrap road tax and introduce extra 5p per litre on all fuels.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every one who uses a vehicle would be paying this charge also equipment such as boats, M/cycles,Mini M/cycles, grass cutting equipment,foreign visitors etc.etc.And anyone using powered vehicles and equipment in the UK. Those who use more would pay more.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
